T02D1656:229b-1: sarba bh'u ta ba lim bi dhi:/
T02D1656:229b-3: 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga / sangs rgyas thod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1656:229b-4: dngos kun rang bzhin bde ba thob //
T02D1656:229b-5: sna tshogs sde la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1656:229b-6: bla mas bstan pa'i rim bzhin du //
T02D1656:229b-7: sems can don phyir gtor ma bshad //
T02D1656:229b-8: re zhig dang po nyid du ni //
T02D1656:229b-9: yul gyi nyes pa sdong byed sngags //
T02D1656:229b-10: brjod pas dngos kun stong par bsgom //
T02D1656:229b-11: de nas ram gyur nyi ma la //
T02D1656:229b-12: h'um bsam yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D1656:229b-13: sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom byas nas //
T02D1656:229b-14: ra ba dra ba sa gzhi bsam //
T02D1656:229b-15: de nang skad cig tsam las ni //
T02D1656:229b-16: 'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams dang //
T02D1656:229b-17: khams gsum sems can ma lus pa //
T02D1656:229b-18: phyogs skyod mkha' 'gror bcas pa bskyed //
T02D1656:229b-19: bdag ni de rnams mdun gnas pa //
T02D1656:229b-20: he ru ka yi gzugs bsams la //
T02D1656:229b-21: gnas bdun go cha gsal bar dgod //
T02D1656:229b-22: de nas mdun du yam las ni //
T02D1656:229b-23: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1656:229b-24: de steng ram ni yongs su gyur pas //
T02D1656:229b-26: de steng aa las thod pa'o //
T02D1656:229b-27: thod pa dkar po'i dbus su ni //
T02D1656:229b-28: bi mu ra shu ma lnga las //
T02D1656:229b-29: bdud rtsi lnga ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D1656:229b-30: go ku da ha na las ni //
T02D1656:229b-31: lcags kyu lnga yang de bzhin bsam //
T02D1656:229b-32: da nas rlung gis me spar zhing //
T02D1656:229b-33: thod pa dros pa'i rlangs pa ni //
T02D1656:229b-34: rdo rje'i rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan byung //
T02D1656:230a-0: de yang bsil bar bya ba'i @230a * //
T02D1656:230a-2: ; thod pa'i steng gi mtho gang du //
T02D1656:230a-3: aom gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1656:230a-4: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin aom gyis ni //
T02D1656:230a-5: steng nas byin gyis brlabs par bsam //
T02D1656:230a-6: de las ba mo lta bu yi //
T02D1656:230a-7: bdud rtsi babs pas bsil bar 'gyur //
T02D1656:230a-8: de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags ni //
T02D1656:230a-9: lan bdun bzlas pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1656:230a-10: de rjes snying ga'i sa bon gyis //
T02D1656:230a-11: ye shes bskul zhing gsang sngags brjod //
T02D1656:230a-12: aom buddha ka p'a li ni aa:/
T02D1656:230a-13: kham gram dr'um shr'um aa: aa: aa: aa: h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02D1656:230a-14: bsgyings bcas sngags ni zlos bzhin pas //
T02D1656:230a-15: 'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams dang //
T02D1656:230a-16: zhi byed bde byed 'byung po rnams //
T02D1656:230a-17: tshogs bcas myur du bkug nas kyang //
T02D1656:230a-18: dam tshig tshogs la thim gyur pa //
T02D1656:230a-20: de nas spos dang me tog sogs //
T02D1656:230a-21: gzhan yang yid las byung ba yi //
T02D1656:230a-22: rdo rje mched sogs rnams kyis mchod //
T02D1656:230a-23: lha rnams lce ni nas 'bras tsam ;
T02D1656:230a-24: ; bu gu can ni rdo rjer bsam //
T02D1656:230a-25: de yi rtse mor aom bsams te //
T02D1656:230a-26: 'od zer gyis drangs gsol bar bsam //
T02D1656:230a-27: 'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams la //
T02D1656:230a-28: aom buddha ka p'a li ni ba lim grihna grihna /
T02D1656:230a-29: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya kha kha h'um /
T02D1656:230a-31: yongs su bsngo ba'i sngags brjod de /
T02D1656:230a-32: aom ma h'a ka p'a la badzre tse tre pu tse tre /
T02D1656:230a-33: aa lamba ne pri na ya sarba bh'u ta m'a
T02D1656:230a-34: r'a na m'a ra ya sarba m'a r'a na k'i
T02D1656:230a-35: la ya / m'a ra ya dusht'a na autstsha ta ya sarba bighn'a bi tra ya /
T02D1656:230a-37: yaksha r'aksha sa pi sh'a tsa sho sha ya sapta
T02D1656:230a-38: p'a t'a la ga ta na sa ra pra sa
T02D1656:230a-39: ra pra sa ra h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat
T02D1656:230a-40: / de nas tshim par gyur nas su //
T02D1656:230a-41: smon lam mthar ni dag par bya //
T02D1656:230a-42: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1656:230a-43: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1656:230a-44: gzang du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1656:230a-45: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D1656:230a-46: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02D1656:230a-47: de ltar chos 'di shes par gyis //
T02D1656:230a-48: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D1656:230a-50: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02D1656:230a-51: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / sems can thams cad sdig med pa'i //
T02D1656:230a-52: sangs rgyas nyid du phrad gyur cig / lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang //
T02D1656:230a-53: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar shog /
T02D1656:230b-0: @230b ma brgal ba rnams rgal bar shog / rnal 'byor gtsug lag dam pa la //
T02D1656:230b-1: da lta nyid du gnas par shog / lag pa
T02D1656:230b-2: brkyang ste sa la bzhag / se gol lan gsum
T02D1656:230b-3: gdab bya zhing // dril bu dkrol bas der 'bad pas //
T02D1656:230b-4: mgron rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya //
T02D1656:230b-5: sangs rgyas thod pa'i 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor
T02D1656:230b-6: ma'i cho ga / slob dpon sa ra ha ba'i
T02D1656:230b-7: zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
